attributes.action: Abolish the increased costs of Road tax for 4 x 4's for farmers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Prime Minister to abolish the increased costs of Road Tax for 4 x 4's.  These are an essential vehicle for farmers especially on rough terrain, due to lack of funding for farmers it is becoming increasing difficult to continue farming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
